clinical_study.brief_title: To Evaluate Safety and Effectiveness of RovatitanTab.
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Single-arm, Prospective, Observational Study to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of a Fixed-dose Combination Containing Valsartan and Rosuvastatin (Rovatitan® Tablet) in Patient With Hypertension and Hypercholesterolemia

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and effectiveness of a fixed-dose combination containing valsartan and rosuvastatin (Rovatitan® Tablet) in patient with hypertension and hypercholesterolemia

detailed_description.textblock:
- Effectiveness: the ratio of patients who reach target BP or LDL-cholesterol
- Safety: we will collect safety data

primary_outcome.measure: The ratio of patients who reach the target BP
The ratio of patients who reach the target LDLcholesterol
primary_outcome.description: target LDL refered to Hyperlipidemia pharmacotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: The ratio of patients who reach the target BP and LDL-c

arm_group.description: Rovatitan 5/80mg (Rosuvastatin 5mg/Valsartan 80mg) Rovatitan 5/160mg (Rosuvastatin 5mg/Valsartan 160mg) Rovatitan 10/80mg (Rosuvastatin 10mg/Valsartan 80mg) Rovatitan 10/160mg (Rosuvastatin 10mg/Valsartan 160mg) Rovatitan 20/80mg (Rosuvastatin 20mg/Valsartan 80mg) Rovatitan 20/160mg (Rosuvastatin 20mg/Valsartan 160mg)

study_pop.textblock: Patients who have hypertension and hyperlipidemia

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who have hypertension and hyperlipidemia and older than 19 years
- Patients who undertstand purpose and method of study, agree with study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who have been administered Rosuvastatin/Valsartan as a anti- hyperlipiddemic/anti-hypertensive drugs
- Uncontrolled hypertension (SBP>=180mmHg or DBP>=110mmHg)
- Patients who participated another clinical study or observational study 3 months ago.
